Name: extnamespace
Description: Schema containing the extension's exported\n objects

Name: extrelocatable
Description: True if extension can be relocated to another\n schema

Name: extconfig
Description: Array of regclass OIDs for the\n extension's configuration table(s), or NULL if none

Name: extcondition
Description: Array of WHERE-clause filter\n conditions for the extension's configuration table(s), or NULL if none
